comments:
The bug started with 3M5, and is really annoying (however not blocking). 

Whenever I quit Eclipse (through menu, button or key shortcut ), my Eclipse application ALWAYS 
crash. I can provide you the native stack that  Mac OS X (10.3.2) wants to report to Apple if that 
helps.

Thanks for the outstanding job. Eclipse rocks.

Please always attach (not include as comment) any stack traces (MacOS console logs and Eclipse 
.log entries).

I suspect this is a dup of Bug 48702.  Need the stack trace or error message to
be sure.

Crash report to be sent to Apple:
